org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure
Class DataFile

java.lang.Object
  org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.DataFile

public class DataFile
extends java.lang.Object

Class DataFile is used to create file objects which contain information on the filename, size, pinning status, master status and creation time of the files.

Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4

Constructor Detail

DataFile

public DataFile(java.lang.String lfn,
                int size,
                int fileIndex,
                boolean pin,
                boolean master)
Construct a DataFile object with the given parameters.

Parameters:
lfn - the Logical File Name of this DataFile
size - the size in MB of this DataFile
fileIndex - a unique integer identifier for this file
pin - true if this file is pinned, false otherwise
master - true if this is the master copy of this lfn, false otherwise
Method Detail

se

public StorageElement se()
Get a file's Storage Element

Returns:
the SE the file is stored on, or null if it isn't stored on any SE

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
A meaningful string describing this file.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

registerSE

public void registerSE(StorageElement se)
Inform a DataFile it is now stored on a particular StorageElement

Parameters:
se - the storage element the file is now stored on.

deregisterSE

public void deregisterSE()
Dissociate this file from any SE.

public java.lang.String lfn()
Get the logical file name of this file.

Returns:
The name of the file

public int size()
Get the size of this file in MB.

Returns:
The size of the file

public int fileIndex()
Get the index of this file.

Returns:
The file index

Returns:

setLastEstimatedValue

public void setLastEstimatedValue(double value)
Set the last estimated value of the file.

addPin

public void addPin()
Add a pin to the file. The file cannot be removed unless the number of pins on it is zero.

releasePin

public void releasePin()
Release a pin on the file.

isPinned

public boolean isPinned()
Get the pin status of this file.

Returns:
The pin status.

isDeleteable

public boolean isDeleteable()
Check whether this file is deleteable.

Returns:
True if the file is not a master file and is not pinned, false otherwise.

createTime

public long createTime()
Get the time at which this file was created.

Returns:
the timestamp of the file

getLastAccessTime

public long getLastAccessTime()
Get the time at which this file was last accessed.

Returns:
The time of the last access if there are any, the timestamp otherwise.

read

public void read()
Called whenever the file is accessed to update the access history.

cloneFile

public DataFile cloneFile()
To get round the fact that Object.clone() is protected.

Returns:
A new DataFile with identical lfn, size and file index as this one.
